column1:
1. Clean
2. Well Organized
3. No qualified doctors
4.  doctors are not human beings
5. Nurses are not human nor professional
6. When I escalated to the top management(outpatient clinic director) , that what happened : he cared a lot and moved by himself
a. Staff and doctors don't listen or care, it seems it is authority problem
b. The consultants that comes weekly from other governerates are careless,they change every  one week which is not enough to follow up with the patients

Conclusion
1. Permananet management are supers
2. Doctors are not human unfortunately and they treat us like....
3. Nurses are not human beings

Thank you for waking me from this dream and see your reality

Hospital lacks experienced doctors and unprofessional nursing staff When entering the intensive care unit there is no shoe cover or gloves.  The presence of corona rooms on the floor below the intensive care rooms.  Not allowed to see x-rays and analyzes?  I went through a very difficult experience, and I hope it will never happen to anyone again
